title: Learning Technology Design and Collaborative Strategies for Advanced Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics theory and teaching experience
context.additional_context: A course designed to strengthen pre-service and in-service teachers' mathematics instructional design competencies, systematically incorporating collaborative processes between learning designers and teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective learning technology design frameworks in LMS-based math education courses
Learners can collaborate with instructional designers to develop standardized mathematics education modules
Learners can design and evaluate mathematics problem-solving activities using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
